verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
They’re underneath the Blood, on the Cross of Calvary,
As far removed as darkness is from dawn;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
In the sea of God’s forgetfulness, that’s good enough for me,
Praise God,
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
And when I meet the scoffers who asks me where they are,
I say,
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
The Lord took full possession, the devil
did depart,
I’m glad
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
You got me into trouble, but Jesus got me out,
I’m glad
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
My soul is filled with music, with all my heart
I say,
I know
my sins are gone.
